Class MixedFirebaseAdapter

    com.firebase.client.ValueEventListener

    public class MixedFirebaseAdapter
extends ItemAdapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
implements com.firebase.client.ValueEventListener
    Created by s132054 on 25-3-2016. ItemAdapter for mixed items from Firebase (both EventItem and GooglePlaceItem) (see ItemAdapter)
